original_title: Olivier Dazat ou L'amour du Vélo
overview: Filmed on the Longchamp cycling circuit in Paris, the writer Olivier Dazat, author of the books Seigneurs et forçats du vélo (published by Calmann-Lévy) and Panache (published by Le Dilettante), shares his thoughts on the champions Fausto Coppi, Hugo Koblet, Jacques Anquetil, Raymond Poulidor, Luis Ocaña and Eddy Merckx.
title: Olivier Dazat ou L'amour du Vélo
